VII.i.3.A.2.c
.
Effect of a Child’s Entry Into Active Duty
An individual’s entry into active duty in the armed forces has no effect on the individual’s status as a child for VA purposes
if
all other requirements are met.
Note
:  In
VAOPGCPREC 61-1990
, the Office of General Counsel held that an established stepchild’s entry into active duty in the armed forces does
not
deprive him/her of continued status as a member of the Veteran’s household.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A - Establishing a Child’s Age and Relationship
